trait.name: Eye Color
trait.description: Eye color is an trait influenced by more than one gene. Currently, the number of genes that contribute to eye color is unknown. However, twin studies show that eye color is highly heritable.

genotype.longmeaning: 85% chance of brown eyes, 14% chance of green eyes, and 1% chance of blue eyes.
56% chance of brown eyes, 37% chance of green eyes, and 7% chance of blue eyes.
72% chance of blue eyes, 27% chance of green eyes, and 1% chance of brown eyes.
